snippet.title: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies - Complete Edition | PS5 & XBX|S Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies - Complete Edition arrives on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on August 15th, 2024.

On the night of March 14th 2001, exactly one day after the incident at Yeondu High, four individuals return to the school in search of answers to the unsolved mysteries that haunt them. Uncover the hidden dark truth in this direct sequel to the Korean horror cult classic. Investigate bizarre phenomena, evade bloodthirsty killers, and unravel a twisting narrative across three unnerving episodes.  

Follow PQube Games on social media!
